actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage or 4 (1d8) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The cueyatl can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Jungle Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The cueyatl has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in jungle terrain.

special_abilities.name: Slippery
special_abilities.desc: The cueyatl has advantage on saving throws and ability checks made to escape a grapple.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: The cueyatl's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.
